articles.author: Sarah Rumpf
articles.title: Shaun the Sheep will be the first 'astronaut' to fly on the Artemis I lunar mission - Fox News
articles.description: Aardman and the European Space Agency announced the specially trained astronaut, Shaun the Sheep, has been assigned a seat on the Artemis I mission to the Moon
articles.content:
Shaun the Sheep is set for an all new adventure after being assigned a seat on the Artemis I mission to the Moon.

articles.title: Archie Battersbee: European court rejects appeal to prolong life support - The Irish Times
articles.description: Court refuses application by parents of 12-year-old who has been in a coma since April
articles.content:
The European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) has rejected an application by the parents of Archie Battersbee for it to stop his life support treatment from being removed.
